text: YOU: Hi Sanya! I'm looking for a competent, friendly, team-oriented developer. Do you have someone to recommend? SANYA: Yeah! Have you heard of Mihir? He's currently pursuing Btech Cybersecurity from Nmim Mukesh Patel College of Engineering and Management. He's known for his creativity and problem-solving skills. YOU: Sounds interesting! Thanks for the recommendation, Sanya. SANYA: No problem at all! Let me know if you need more info.
